i was 15 me and two other girls broke into her uncle s house and stole a litre of this like  mexican illegal liquor between the three of us we drank it all i blacked out  i m 21 now  still blacking out  i may or may not be an alcoholic  but i love it so whatever lmao.
first few times were in high school and rather vaguestandard the real notable memory i have is the day of my 21st birthday i went to buy a bottle of vodka  took it home and got absolutely obliterated with my girlfriend in about 45 minutes threw up on my bed 1010 would do it again.
i was 15 at a friends house his dad was usually away on air force business his mom would let us have wine from time to time he had another friend that was 22 and was a regular presence there this night the dad was home for once but super sick with a kidney infection or some shit mom and 22 yr old get shit faced and let us drink vodka first time i ve had more than a single drink in a setting we decide in our drunkenness to go film people with our camera as was tradition long story short we found mom and 22 yr old fucking in the pool videoed it  nothing pervy we were yelling  what the fuck  as soon as we realized what was going on  younger son showed the dad craziest fucking night of my life ensued the dad trashed the house asked us what we knewbow long it was going onrealized we were hammered i hid under the bed i ve never been in such a fucked up situation yay booze.
i was 9  parents had friends over for new years and left their extra booze downstairs  next to the family room where me and my friends were delegated for the evening decided to go into fridge and try what our parents were drinking ended up being vodka  it was cold enough that it didnt bother us and we saw the adults doing it so we kept drinking it and pretending nothing happened ended up pooping in the waste basket in the basement and throwing beer bottles at cars.
got drunk in an alley with some friends from high school  forgot that some lady brought me out coal tablets cuz i was blacked out and i freaked out when i was throwing up black shit later thinking all my insides are coming out.
on my left one friend was passed out and on my right the other one was having sex i was 15 we drank way too many md 2020s once she started having sex i drank two to try to sleep and i got so drunk but was still awake   i was nt that drunk and so i woke my friend up to switch places w me.
well  i do nt remember the first time that i got  drunk   i know i was about 1415 though i remember my first drink  orange gatorade and captain morgan  do nt try it  i was 14 at my best friends house on a random weeknight in summer i hated it  i remember the first time that i was a shit show  i was 16 and we went to 4 different parties that night ended up at some apartment in a not fantastic part of town with a bunch of 20 something foreign guys i d never heard of before we had a handle of that uv lemonade premixed crap and the last thing i remember is someone asking if i wanted to mix it with moonshine  i said yes   then i recall being in my parents basement throwing up in the bathroom at 4am  highschool was so great  eyeroll   drinks franzia moscato out of mug.
home brew  spewed my guts up several times  my dad was there  he made sure i had plenty of water and made me eat some bread later in the night.
maybe i should share my first time  i was 17  and i was over at some dude s house that a bunch of my friends knew we went to his house and his parents were all cool with us being over and drinking we drank all sorts of stuff ranging from jack daniels to kirin ichiban beer  which tastes like ass do nt even bother drinking that horse piss   i was nt feeling anything until i decided that i needed to take a piss and suddenly the room span once i stood up i was groovin   feeling good  and just wanted to vibe with my friends i ll never forget washing my hands and seeing how fucked up i looked in that mirror before i walked out and kept drinking fast forward all these years later and here i am jamming out good times.
i was 16 years old  at a party  drank a bottle of wine  which is perfectly legal for a 16yr old in germany  and was pretty drunk since i do nt get hangovers it was a fantastic first time experience with alcohol but now that i m living alone it s a slight problem because i love wine waaaaay too much.
the first time i truly got drunk was visiting dartmouth i was on an official visit for football  was too scared to get drunk any of my previous times drinking  was visiting with one of my best friends  and just decided to go wild just broke up with my gf  frat parties  football parties and college girls as a senior in hs was heaven did nt puke  got some late night pizza  saw too many boobs to count that weekend was drunk for the plane ride him with my dad he was proud.
shit  i still remember i was 19 and i had just been dumped by my girlfriend at the time i loved her lamf and i had nt had a breakup that bad before i drank the vodka my family kept in the kitchen  for cooking  which i had never even been tempted by before i mixed it with cranberry juice and i remember watching mad men until i blacked out it felt so good and i did nt know that you actually could nt just keep going and going all of a sudden i was waking up in my bed with the door knob removed and the empty bottle there on the table my parents said they found me on the ground passed out and had no idea what was going on i felt really shitty about scaring them and even worse about the whole breakup despite the copious amounts of vodka i had zero hangover now that i miss.

alright  i m quite abit hammered while writing this but still concious so thats something i guess do nt wan na get at how many times i had to correct  hoy  to  how  and  any  to  and  and concious to well you get it  the following steps are crutial  1 get a bottleabooze ready to drink  ready it  is important  2 inhale as much as you can  take a good healthy breathe in  3 exhale until you feel you have just a little bit    air left in you 4 take a good mouthful of booze  haha no pun intended   like make both cheeks like water balloons  i m serious i also just typed  seriums  once tbh wtf  the next step is important to be done quickly in succession  5 swallow 6 inhale thru your nose very quickly after swallowing  no long seconds delay  quickly  air thru the nose you get it   7    8 profit downed half a bottle of ugly tasting bourbon  hell i even spelled it bornben for one second how drunk i am  it could be a thing of practice  but it s rather easy just swallow and very shortly after inhale thru the nose  let that fresh air in  what it does is  most of the taste is actually  smell  passing thru the connectors that connect the nose with your mouthpartthingy  you know when your nose runs and it runs down your throat if its really bad  like very cold outside  thats those connections   them pipes theres an anotom anatomi i give up  theres a ana something correct way of naming it  when you think you taste  a wine  or whiskey  it is actually the vapors passing up back into your nose  which makes a burning feeling in your throat and nose as well  and makes you smell all the different flavours of the booze  wine  whatever alcohol you have  by inhaling  you push those flavours back  your tongue is actually only able to distinguish  sweet  sour  bitter thats it all the flavour is in your nose  practically that goes with all food or drink that  tastes  good  it is the little smell particels pushing pack into your nose parts and therefore creating a  smelltaste  sensation  this method of  pushing back  the flavours will also work on food  or anything that isnt entirely bitter  sweet or sour a lemmon will for example still mess you up  because the tongue mainly detects bitter and sour  so you may  soften  a bite on a lemmon a bit  but it wo nt be as effective  this method helped me win a couple bets and i as a drinking master  wanted to share this with you  enjoy  drink reasonable   safe  and dont drink and drive   forgot to add  you will ge t a little taste aka smell for about 5 secs after the chugg  because alcohol  sticks  to the slimy tissue in the throat mouth and tongue  but not as bad as just trying to sip from the bottle  the payload will go down like water  tasteless  like swallowing a huge clogged up pile of snot from a cold only will you shortly thereafter become an alcoholic like me and most importantly  drunk as a skunk high as a kite stiff as a board whatever you wan na name it.

alright  i m quite abit hammered while writing this but still concious so thats something i guess do nt wan na get at how many times i had to correct  hoy  to  how  and  any  to  and  and concious to well you get it  the following steps are crutial  1 get a bottleabooze ready to drink  ready it  is important  2 inhale as much as you can  take a good healthy breathe in  3 exhale until you feel you have just a little bit    air left in you 4 take a good mouthful of booze  haha no pun intended   like make both cheeks like water balloons  i m serious i also just typed  seriums  once tbh wtf  the next step is important to be done quickly in succession  5 swallow 6 inhale thru your nose very quickly after swallowing  no long seconds delay  quickly  air thru the nose you get it   7    8 profit downed half a bottle of ugly tasting bourbon  hell i even spelled it bornben for one second how drunk i am  it could be a thing of practice  but it s rather easy just swallow and very shortly after inhale thru the nose  let that fresh air in  what it does is  most of the taste is actually  smell  passing thru the connectors that connect the nose with your mouthpartthingy  you know when your nose runs and it runs down your throat if its really bad  like very cold outside  thats those connections   them pipes theres an anotom anatomi i give up  theres a ana something correct way of naming it  when you think you taste  a wine  or whiskey  it is actually the vapors passing up back into your nose  which makes a burning feeling in your throat and nose as well  and makes you smell all the different flavours of the booze  wine  whatever alcohol you have  by inhaling  you push those flavours back  your tongue is actually only able to distinguish  sweet  sour  bitter thats it all the flavour is in your nose  practically that goes with all food or drink that  tastes  good  it is the little smell particels pushing pack into your nose parts and therefore creating a  smelltaste  sensation  this method of  pushing back  the flavours will also work on food  or anything that isnt entirely bitter  sweet or sour a lemmon will for example still mess you up  because the tongue mainly detects bitter and sour  so you may  soften  a bite on a lemmon a bit  but it wo nt be as effective  this method helped me win a couple bets and i as a drinking master  wanted to share this with you  enjoy  drink reasonable   safe  and dont drink and drive   forgot to add  you will ge t a little taste aka smell for about 5 secs after the chugg  because alcohol  sticks  to the slimy tissue in the throat mouth and tongue  but not as bad as just trying to sip from the bottle  the payload will go down like water  tasteless  like swallowing a huge clogged up pile of snot from a cold only will you shortly thereafter become an alcoholic like me and most importantly  drunk as a skunk high as a kite stiff as a board whatever you wan na name it.

i was 15 at a friends house his dad was usually away on air force business his mom would let us have wine from time to time he had another friend that was 22 and was a regular presence there this night the dad was home for once but super sick with a kidney infection or some shit mom and 22 yr old get shit faced and let us drink vodka first time i ve had more than a single drink in a setting we decide in our drunkenness to go film people with our camera as was tradition long story short we found mom and 22 yr old fucking in the pool videoed it  nothing pervy we were yelling  what the fuck  as soon as we realized what was going on  younger son showed the dad craziest fucking night of my life ensued the dad trashed the house asked us what we knewbow long it was going onrealized we were hammered i hid under the bed i ve never been in such a fucked up situation yay booze.

runs and it runs down your throat if its really bad  like very cold outside  thats those connections   them pipes theres an anotom anatomi i give up  theres a ana something correct way of naming it different flavours of the booze  wine  whatever alcohol you have  by inhaling  you push those flavours back  your tongue is actually only able to distinguish  sweet  sour  bitter thats it all the sensation  this method of  pushing back  the flavours will also work on food  or anything that isnt entirely bitter  sweet or sour a lemmon will for example still mess you up  because the tongue mainly detects bitter and sour  so you may  soften  a bite on a lemmon a bit  but it wo nt be as effective  this method helped me win a couple bets and i as a drinking master  wanted to share this well you get it  the following steps are crutial  1 get a bottleabooze ready to drink  ready it  is important  2 inhale as much as you can  take a good healthy breathe in  3 exhale until you feel you have just a little bit    air left in you 4 take a good mouthful of booze  haha no pun intended   like make both cheeks like water balloons  i m serious i also just typed  seriums  once tbh wtf  the next step is important to be done quickly in succession  5 swallow 6 inhale thru your nose very quickly after swallowing  no long seconds delay  quickly  air thru the nose you get it   7    8 profit downed half a bottle of ugly tasting bourbon  hell i even spelled it bornben for one second how drunk i am  it could be a thing of practice  but it s rather easy just swallow and very shortly after inhale thru the nose  let that fresh air in  what it does is  most of the taste is actually  smell  passing thru the connectors that connect the nose with your mouthpartthingy  you know when your nose runs and it runs down your throat if its really bad  like very cold outside  thats those connections   them pipes theres an anotom anatomi i give up  theres a ana something correct way of naming it  when you think you taste  a wine  or whiskey  it is actually the vapors passing up back into your nose  which makes a burning feeling in your throat and nose as well  and makes you smell all the different flavours of the booze  wine  whatever alcohol you have  by inhaling  you push those flavours back  your tongue is actually only able to distinguish  sweet  sour  bitter thats it all the flavour is in your nose  practically that goes with all food or drink that  tastes  good  it is the little smell particels pushing pack into your nose parts and therefore creating a  smelltaste  sensation  this method of  pushing back  the flavours will also work on food  or anything that isnt entirely bitter  sweet or sour a lemmon will for example still mess you up  because the tongue mainly detects bitter and sour  so you may  soften  a bite on a lemmon a bit  but it wo nt be as effective  this method helped me win a couple bets and i as a drinking master  wanted to share this with you  enjoy  drink reasonable   safe  and dont drink and drive   forgot to add  you will ge t a little taste aka smell for about 5 secs after the chugg  because alcohol  sticks  to the slimy tissue in the throat mouth and tongue  but not as bad as just trying to sip from the bottle  the payload will go down like water  tasteless  like swallowing a huge clogged up pile of snot from a cold only will you shortly thereafter become an alcoholic like me and most importantly  drunk as a skunk high as a kite stiff as a board whatever you wan na name it.

i was 15 me and two other girls broke into her uncle s house and stole a litre of this like  mexican illegal liquor between the three of us we drank it all i blacked out  i m 21 now  still blacking out  i may or may not be an alcoholic  but i love it so whatever lmao.
first few times were in high school and rather vaguestandard the real notable memory i have is the day of my 21st birthday i went to buy a bottle of vodka  took it home and got absolutely obliterated with my girlfriend in about 45 minutes threw up on my bed 1010 would do it again.
i was 15 at a friends house his dad was usually away on air force business his mom would let us have wine from time to time he had another friend that was 22 and was a regular presence there this night the dad was home for once but super sick with a kidney infection or some shit mom and 22 yr old get shit faced and let us drink vodka first time i ve had more than a single drink in a setting we decide in our drunkenness to go film people with our camera as was tradition long story short we found mom and 22 yr old fucking in the pool videoed it  nothing pervy we were yelling  what the fuck  as soon as we realized what was going on  younger son showed the dad craziest fucking night of my life ensued the dad trashed the house asked us what we knewbow long it was going onrealized we were hammered i hid under the bed i ve never been in such a fucked up situation yay booze.
i was 9  parents had friends over for new years and left their extra booze downstairs  next to the family room where me and my friends were delegated for the evening decided to go into fridge and try what our parents were drinking ended up being vodka  it was cold enough that it didnt bother us and we saw the adults doing it so we kept drinking it and pretending nothing happened ended up pooping in the waste basket in the basement and throwing beer bottles at cars.
got drunk in an alley with some friends from high school  forgot that some lady brought me out coal tablets cuz i was blacked out and i freaked out when i was throwing up black shit later thinking all my insides are coming out.
on my left one friend was passed out and on my right the other one was having sex i was 15 we drank way too many md 2020s once she started having sex i drank two to try to sleep and i got so drunk but was still awake   i was nt that drunk and so i woke my friend up to switch places w me.
well  i do nt remember the first time that i got  drunk   i know i was about 1415 though i remember my first drink  orange gatorade and captain morgan  do nt try it  i was 14 at my best friends house on a random weeknight in summer i hated it  i remember the first time that i was a shit show  i was 16 and we went to 4 different parties that night ended up at some apartment in a not fantastic part of town with a bunch of 20 something foreign guys i d never heard of before we had a handle of that uv lemonade premixed crap and the last thing i remember is someone asking if i wanted to mix it with moonshine  i said yes   then i recall being in my parents basement throwing up in the bathroom at 4am  highschool was so great  eyeroll   drinks franzia moscato out of mug.
home brew  spewed my guts up several times  my dad was there  he made sure i had plenty of water and made me eat some bread later in the night.
maybe i should share my first time  i was 17  and i was over at some dude s house that a bunch of my friends knew we went to his house and his parents were all cool with us being over and drinking we drank all sorts of stuff ranging from jack daniels to kirin ichiban beer  which tastes like ass do nt even bother drinking that horse piss   i was nt feeling anything until i decided that i needed to take a piss and suddenly the room span once i stood up i was groovin   feeling good  and just wanted to vibe with my friends i ll never forget washing my hands and seeing how fucked up i looked in that mirror before i walked out and kept drinking fast forward all these years later and here i am jamming out good times.
i was 16 years old  at a party  drank a bottle of wine  which is perfectly legal for a 16yr old in germany  and was pretty drunk since i do nt get hangovers it was a fantastic first time experience with alcohol but now that i m living alone it s a slight problem because i love wine waaaaay too much.
the first time i truly got drunk was visiting dartmouth i was on an official visit for football  was too scared to get drunk any of my previous times drinking  was visiting with one of my best friends  and just decided to go wild just broke up with my gf  frat parties  football parties and college girls as a senior in hs was heaven did nt puke  got some late night pizza  saw too many boobs to count that weekend was drunk for the plane ride him with my dad he was proud.
shit  i still remember i was 19 and i had just been dumped by my girlfriend at the time i loved her lamf and i had nt had a breakup that bad before i drank the vodka my family kept in the kitchen  for cooking  which i had never even been tempted by before i mixed it with cranberry juice and i remember watching mad men until i blacked out it felt so good and i did nt know that you actually could nt just keep going and going all of a sudden i was waking up in my bed with the door knob removed and the empty bottle there on the table my parents said they found me on the ground passed out and had no idea what was going on i felt really shitty about scaring them and even worse about the whole breakup despite the copious amounts of vodka i had zero hangover now that i miss.
i was 16 or 17 i asked my brother  he was 19  for a bottle of rum and he bought me spiced rum like a good bro i ended up downing the quart extra quick because it tasted like vanilla coke and i loved vanilla coke and the rest is history.
i only remember throwing up and saying i ll never drink again  but look at me now  ma  look at me noooow.

flavour is in your nose  practically that goes with all food or drink that  tastes  good  it is the little smell particels pushing pack into your nose parts and therefore creating a  smelltaste  sensation  this method of  pushing back  the flavours will also work on food  or anything that isnt entirely bitter  sweet or sour a lemmon will for example still mess you up  because the tongue mainly detects bitter and sour  so you may  soften  a bite on a lemmon a bit  but it wo nt be as effective  this method helped me win a couple bets and i as a drinking master  wanted to share this with you  enjoy  drink reasonable   safe  and dont drink and drive   forgot to add  you will ge t a little taste aka smell for about 5 secs after the chugg  because alcohol  sticks  to the slimy tissue in the throat mouth and tongue  but not as bad as just trying to sip from the bottle  the payload will go down like water  tasteless  like swallowing a huge clogged up pile of snot from a cold only will you shortly thereafter become an alcoholic like me and most importantly  drunk as a skunk high as a kite stiff as a board whatever you wan na name it.

i was 15 me and two other girls broke into her uncle s house and stole a litre of this like  mexican illegal liquor between the three of us we drank it all i blacked out  i m 21 now  still blacking out  i may or may not be an alcoholic  but i love it so whatever lmao.
first few times were in high school and rather vaguestandard the real notable memory i have is the day of my 21st birthday i went to buy a bottle of vodka  took it home and got absolutely obliterated with my girlfriend in about 45 minutes threw up on my bed 1010 would do it again.
i was 15 at a friends house his dad was usually away on air force business his mom would let us have wine from time to time he had another friend that was 22 and was a regular presence there this night the dad was home for once but super sick with a kidney infection or some shit mom and 22 yr old get shit faced and let us drink vodka first time i ve had more than a single drink in a setting we decide in our drunkenness to go film people with our camera as was tradition long story short we found mom and 22 yr old fucking in the pool videoed it  nothing pervy we were yelling  what the fuck  as soon as we realized what was going on  younger son showed the dad craziest fucking night of my life ensued the dad trashed the house asked us what we knewbow long it was going onrealized we were hammered i hid under the bed i ve never been in such a fucked up situation yay booze.
i was 9  parents had friends over for new years and left their extra booze downstairs  next to the family room where me and my friends were delegated for the evening decided to go into fridge and try what our parents were drinking ended up being vodka  it was cold enough that it didnt bother us and we saw the adults doing it so we kept drinking it and pretending nothing happened ended up pooping in the waste basket in the basement and throwing beer bottles at cars.

well  i do nt remember the first time that i got  drunk   i know i was about 1415 though i remember my first drink  orange gatorade and captain morgan  do nt try it  i was 14 at my best friends house on a random weeknight in summer i hated it  i remember the first time that i was a shit show  i was 16 and we went to 4 different parties that night ended up at some apartment in a not fantastic part of town with a bunch of 20 something foreign guys i d never heard of before we had a handle of that uv lemonade premixed crap and the last thing i remember is someone asking if i wanted to mix it with moonshine  i said yes   then i recall being in my parents basement throwing up in the bathroom at 4am  highschool was so great  eyeroll   drinks franzia moscato out of mug.

inhale thru the nose  let that fresh air in  what it does is  most of the taste is actually  smell  passing thru the connectors that connect the nose with your mouthpartthingy  you know when your nose runs and it runs down your throat if its really bad  like very cold outside  thats those connections   them pipes theres an anotom anatomi i give up  theres a ana something correct way of naming it  when you think you taste  a wine  or whiskey  it is actually the vapors passing up back into your nose  which makes a burning feeling in your throat and nose as well  and makes you smell all the different flavours of the booze  wine  whatever alcohol you have  by inhaling  you push those flavours back  your tongue is actually only able to distinguish  sweet  sour  bitter thats it all the flavour is in your nose  practically that goes with all food or drink that  tastes  good  it is the little smell particels pushing pack into your nose parts and therefore creating a  smelltaste  sensation  this method of  pushing back  the flavours will also work on food  or anything that isnt entirely bitter  sweet or sour a lemmon will for example still mess you up  because the tongue mainly detects bitter and sour  so you may  soften  a bite on a lemmon a bit  but it wo nt be as effective  this method helped me win a couple bets and i as a drinking master  wanted to share this with you  enjoy  drink reasonable   safe  and dont drink and drive   forgot to add  you will ge t a little taste aka smell for about 5 secs after the chugg  because alcohol  sticks  to the slimy tissue in the throat mouth and tongue  but not as bad as just trying to sip from the bottle  the payload will go down like water  tasteless  like swallowing a huge clogged up pile of snot from a cold only will you shortly thereafter become an alcoholic like me and most importantly  drunk as a skunk high as a kite stiff as a board whatever you wan na name it.

first few times were in high school and rather vaguestandard the real notable memory i have is the day of my 21st birthday i went to buy a bottle of vodka  took it home and got absolutely obliterated with my girlfriend in about 45 minutes threw up on my bed 1010 would do it again.
i was 15 at a friends house his dad was usually away on air force business his mom would let us have wine from time to time he had another friend that was 22 and was a regular presence there this night the dad was home for once but super sick with a kidney infection or some shit mom and 22 yr old get shit faced and let us drink vodka first time i ve had more than a single drink in a setting we decide in our drunkenness to go film people with our camera as was tradition long story short we found mom and 22 yr old fucking in the pool videoed it  nothing pervy we were yelling  what the fuck  as soon as we realized what was going on  younger son showed the dad craziest fucking night of my life ensued the dad trashed the house asked us what we knewbow long it was going onrealized we were hammered i hid under the bed i ve never been in such a fucked up situation yay booze.
i was 9  parents had friends over for new years and left their extra booze downstairs  next to the family room where me and my friends were delegated for the evening decided to go into fridge and try what our parents were drinking ended up being vodka  it was cold enough that it didnt bother us and we saw the adults doing it so we kept drinking it and pretending nothing happened ended up pooping in the waste basket in the basement and throwing beer bottles at cars.
got drunk in an alley with some friends from high school  forgot that some lady brought me out coal tablets cuz i was blacked out and i freaked out when i was throwing up black shit later thinking all my insides are coming out.

well  i do nt remember the first time that i got  drunk   i know i was about 1415 though i remember my first drink  orange gatorade and captain morgan  do nt try it  i was 14 at my best friends house on a random weeknight in summer i hated it  i remember the first time that i was a shit show  i was 16 and we went to 4 different parties that night ended up at some apartment in a not fantastic part of town with a bunch of 20 something foreign guys i d never heard of before we had a handle of that uv lemonade premixed crap and the last thing i remember is someone asking if i wanted to mix it with moonshine  i said yes   then i recall being in my parents basement throwing up in the bathroom at 4am  highschool was so great  eyeroll   drinks franzia moscato out of mug.

well you get it  the following steps are crutial  1 get a bottleabooze ready to drink  ready it  is important  2 inhale as much as you can  take a good healthy breathe in  3 exhale until you feel you have just a little bit    air left in you 4 take a good mouthful of booze  haha no pun intended   like make both cheeks like water balloons  i m serious i also just typed  seriums  once tbh wtf  the next step is important to be done quickly in succession  5 swallow 6 inhale thru your nose very quickly after swallowing  no long seconds delay  quickly  air thru the nose you get it   7    8 profit downed half a bottle of ugly tasting bourbon  hell i even spelled it bornben for one second how drunk i am  it could be a thing of practice  but it s rather easy just swallow and very shortly after inhale thru the nose  let that fresh air in  what it does is  most of the taste is actually  smell  passing thru the connectors that connect the nose with your mouthpartthingy  you know when your nose runs and it runs down your throat if its really bad  like very cold outside  thats those connections   them pipes theres an anotom anatomi i give up  theres a ana something correct way of naming it  when you think you taste  a wine  or whiskey  it is actually the vapors passing up back into your nose  which makes a burning feeling in your throat and nose as well  and makes you smell all the different flavours of the booze  wine  whatever alcohol you have  by inhaling  you push those flavours back  your tongue is actually only able to distinguish  sweet  sour  bitter thats it all the flavour is in your nose  practically that goes with all food or drink that  tastes  good  it is the little smell particels pushing pack into your nose parts and therefore creating a  smelltaste  sensation  this method of  pushing back  the flavours will also work on food  or anything that isnt entirely bitter  sweet or sour a lemmon will for example still mess you up  because the tongue mainly detects bitter and sour  so you may  soften  a bite on a lemmon a bit  but it wo nt be as effective  this method helped me win a couple bets and i as a drinking master  wanted to share this with you  enjoy  drink reasonable   safe  and dont drink and drive   forgot to add  you will ge t a little taste aka smell for about 5 secs after the chugg  because alcohol  sticks  to the slimy tissue in the throat mouth and tongue  but not as bad as just trying to sip from the bottle  the payload will go down like water  tasteless  like swallowing a huge clogged up pile of snot from a cold only will you shortly thereafter become an alcoholic like me and most importantly  drunk as a skunk high as a kite stiff as a board whatever you wan na name it.

what was it like getting drunk your first time  where  when  what was the occasion  have a drink and discuss it.
i was 15 me and two other girls broke into her uncle s house and stole a litre of this like  mexican illegal liquor between the three of us we drank it all i blacked out  i m 21 now  still blacking out  i may or may not be an alcoholic  but i love it so whatever lmao.
first few times were in high school and rather vaguestandard the real notable memory i have is the day of my 21st birthday i went to buy a bottle of vodka  took it home and got absolutely obliterated with my girlfriend in about 45 minutes threw up on my bed 1010 would do it again.
i was 15 at a friends house his dad was usually away on air force business his mom would let us have wine from time to time he had another friend that was 22 and was a regular presence there this night the dad was home for once but super sick with a kidney infection or some shit mom and 22 yr old get shit faced and let us drink vodka first time i ve had more than a single drink in a setting we decide in our drunkenness to go film people with our camera as was tradition long story short we found mom and 22 yr old fucking in the pool videoed it  nothing pervy we were yelling  what the fuck  as soon as we realized what was going on  younger son showed the dad craziest fucking night of my life ensued the dad trashed the house asked us what we knewbow long it was going onrealized we were hammered i hid under the bed i ve never been in such a fucked up situation yay booze.
i was 9  parents had friends over for new years and left their extra booze downstairs  next to the family room where me and my friends were delegated for the evening decided to go into fridge and try what our parents were drinking ended up being vodka  it was cold enough that it didnt bother us and we saw the adults doing it so we kept drinking it and pretending nothing happened ended up pooping in the waste basket in the basement and throwing beer bottles at cars.
got drunk in an alley with some friends from high school  forgot that some lady brought me out coal tablets cuz i was blacked out and i freaked out when i was throwing up black shit later thinking all my insides are coming out.
on my left one friend was passed out and on my right the other one was having sex i was 15 we drank way too many md 2020s once she started having sex i drank two to try to sleep and i got so drunk but was still awake   i was nt that drunk and so i woke my friend up to switch places w me.
well  i do nt remember the first time that i got  drunk   i know i was about 1415 though i remember my first drink  orange gatorade and captain morgan  do nt try it  i was 14 at my best friends house on a random weeknight in summer i hated it  i remember the first time that i was a shit show  i was 16 and we went to 4 different parties that night ended up at some apartment in a not fantastic part of town with a bunch of 20 something foreign guys i d never heard of before we had a handle of that uv lemonade premixed crap and the last thing i remember is someone asking if i wanted to mix it with moonshine  i said yes   then i recall being in my parents basement throwing up in the bathroom at 4am  highschool was so great  eyeroll   drinks franzia moscato out of mug.
home brew  spewed my guts up several times  my dad was there  he made sure i had plenty of water and made me eat some bread later in the night.
maybe i should share my first time  i was 17  and i was over at some dude s house that a bunch of my friends knew we went to his house and his parents were all cool with us being over and drinking we drank all sorts of stuff ranging from jack daniels to kirin ichiban beer  which tastes like ass do nt even bother drinking that horse piss   i was nt feeling anything until i decided that i needed to take a piss and suddenly the room span once i stood up i was groovin   feeling good  and just wanted to vibe with my friends i ll never forget washing my hands and seeing how fucked up i looked in that mirror before i walked out and kept drinking fast forward all these years later and here i am jamming out good times.
i was 16 years old  at a party  drank a bottle of wine  which is perfectly legal for a 16yr old in germany  and was pretty drunk since i do nt get hangovers it was a fantastic first time experience with alcohol but now that i m living alone it s a slight problem because i love wine waaaaay too much.
the first time i truly got drunk was visiting dartmouth i was on an official visit for football  was too scared to get drunk any of my previous times drinking  was visiting with one of my best friends  and just decided to go wild just broke up with my gf  frat parties  football parties and college girls as a senior in hs was heaven did nt puke  got some late night pizza  saw too many boobs to count that weekend was drunk for the plane ride him with my dad he was proud.
shit  i still remember i was 19 and i had just been dumped by my girlfriend at the time i loved her lamf and i had nt had a breakup that bad before i drank the vodka my family kept in the kitchen  for cooking  which i had never even been tempted by before i mixed it with cranberry juice and i remember watching mad men until i blacked out it felt so good and i did nt know that you actually could nt just keep going and going all of a sudden i was waking up in my bed with the door knob removed and the empty bottle there on the table my parents said they found me on the ground passed out and had no idea what was going on i felt really shitty about scaring them and even worse about the whole breakup despite the copious amounts of vodka i had zero hangover now that i miss.

alright  i m quite abit hammered while writing this but still concious so thats something i guess do nt wan na get at how many times i had to correct  hoy  to  how  and  any  to  and  and concious to well you get it  the following steps are crutial  1 get a bottleabooze ready to drink  ready it  is important  2 inhale as much as you can  take a good healthy breathe in  3 exhale until you feel you have just a little bit    air left in you 4 take a good mouthful of booze  haha no pun intended   like make both cheeks like water balloons  i m serious i also just typed  seriums  once tbh wtf  the next step is important to be done quickly in succession  5 swallow 6 inhale thru your nose very quickly after swallowing  no long seconds delay  quickly  air thru the nose you get it   7    8 profit downed half a bottle of ugly tasting bourbon  hell i even spelled it bornben for one second how drunk i am  it could be a thing of practice  but it s rather easy just swallow and very shortly after inhale thru the nose  let that fresh air in  what it does is  most of the taste is actually  smell  passing thru the connectors that connect the nose with your mouthpartthingy  you know when your nose runs and it runs down your throat if its really bad  like very cold outside  thats those connections   them pipes theres an anotom anatomi i give up  theres a ana something correct way of naming it  when you think you taste  a wine  or whiskey  it is actually the vapors passing up back into your nose  which makes a burning feeling in your throat and nose as well  and makes you smell all the different flavours of the booze  wine  whatever alcohol you have  by inhaling  you push those flavours back  your tongue is actually only able to distinguish  sweet  sour  bitter thats it all the flavour is in your nose  practically that goes with all food or drink that  tastes  good  it is the little smell particels pushing pack into your nose parts and therefore creating a  smelltaste  sensation  this method of  pushing back  the flavours will also work on food  or anything that isnt entirely bitter  sweet or sour a lemmon will for example still mess you up  because the tongue mainly detects bitter and sour  so you may  soften  a bite on a lemmon a bit  but it wo nt be as effective  this method helped me win a couple bets and i as a drinking master  wanted to share this with you  enjoy  drink reasonable   safe  and dont drink and drive   forgot to add  you will ge t a little taste aka smell for about 5 secs after the chugg  because alcohol  sticks  to the slimy tissue in the throat mouth and tongue  but not as bad as just trying to sip from the bottle  the payload will go down like water  tasteless  like swallowing a huge clogged up pile of snot from a cold only will you shortly thereafter become an alcoholic like me and most importantly  drunk as a skunk high as a kite stiff as a board whatever you wan na name it.

i was 15 at a friends house his dad was usually away on air force business his mom would let us have wine from time to time he had another friend that was 22 and was a regular presence there this night the dad was home for once but super sick with a kidney infection or some shit mom and 22 yr old get shit faced and let us drink vodka first time i ve had more than a single drink in a setting we decide in our drunkenness to go film people with our camera as was tradition long story short we found mom and 22 yr old fucking in the pool videoed it  nothing pervy we were yelling  what the fuck  as soon as we realized what was going on  younger son showed the dad craziest fucking night of my life ensued the dad trashed the house asked us what we knewbow long it was going onrealized we were hammered i hid under the bed i ve never been in such a fucked up situation yay booze.

alright  i m quite abit hammered while writing this but still concious so thats something i guess do nt wan na get at how many times i had to correct  hoy  to  how  and  any  to  and  and concious to well you get it  the following steps are crutial  1 get a bottleabooze ready to drink  ready it  is important  2 inhale as much as you can  take a good healthy breathe in  3 exhale until you feel you have just a little bit    air left in you 4 take a good mouthful of booze  haha no pun intended   like make both cheeks like water balloons  i m serious i also just typed  seriums  once tbh wtf  the next step is important to be done quickly in succession  5 swallow 6 inhale thru your nose very quickly after swallowing  no long seconds delay  quickly  air thru the nose you get it   7    8 profit downed half a bottle of ugly tasting bourbon  hell i even spelled it bornben for one second how drunk i am  it could be a thing of practice  but it s rather easy just swallow and very shortly after inhale thru the nose  let that fresh air in  what it does is  most of the taste is actually  smell  passing thru the connectors that connect the nose with your mouthpartthingy  you know when your nose runs and it runs down your throat if its really bad  like very cold outside  thats those connections   them pipes theres an anotom anatomi i give up  theres a ana something correct way of naming it  when you think you taste  a wine  or whiskey  it is actually the vapors passing up back into your nose  which makes a burning feeling in your throat and nose as well  and makes you smell all the different flavours of the booze  wine  whatever alcohol you have  by inhaling  you push those flavours back  your tongue is actually only able to distinguish  sweet  sour  bitter thats it all the flavour is in your nose  practically that goes with all food or drink that  tastes  good  it is the little smell particels pushing pack into your nose parts and therefore creating a  smelltaste  sensation  this method of  pushing back  the flavours will also work on food  or anything that isnt entirely bitter  sweet or sour a lemmon will for example still mess you up  because the tongue mainly detects bitter and sour  so you may  soften  a bite on a lemmon a bit  but it wo nt be as effective  this method helped me win a couple bets and i as a drinking master  wanted to share this with you  enjoy  drink reasonable   safe  and dont drink and drive   forgot to add  you will ge t a little taste aka smell for about 5 secs after the chugg  because alcohol  sticks  to the slimy tissue in the throat mouth and tongue  but not as bad as just trying to sip from the bottle  the payload will go down like water  tasteless  like swallowing a huge clogged up pile of snot from a cold only will you shortly thereafter become an alcoholic like me and most importantly  drunk as a skunk high as a kite stiff as a board whatever you wan na name it.

hey i ve been meaning to write a book i got some questions for you fellow author  first one is are you typing this on word.
what was it like getting drunk your first time  where  when  what was the occasion  have a drink and discuss it.
i was 15 me and two other girls broke into her uncle s house and stole a litre of this like  mexican illegal liquor between the three of us we drank it all i blacked out  i m 21 now  still blacking out  i may or may not be an alcoholic  but i love it so whatever lmao.
first few times were in high school and rather vaguestandard the real notable memory i have is the day of my 21st birthday i went to buy a bottle of vodka  took it home and got absolutely obliterated with my girlfriend in about 45 minutes threw up on my bed 1010 would do it again.
i was 15 at a friends house his dad was usually away on air force business his mom would let us have wine from time to time he had another friend that was 22 and was a regular presence there this night the dad was home for once but super sick with a kidney infection or some shit mom and 22 yr old get shit faced and let us drink vodka first time i ve had more than a single drink in a setting we decide in our drunkenness to go film people with our camera as was tradition long story short we found mom and 22 yr old fucking in the pool videoed it  nothing pervy we were yelling  what the fuck  as soon as we realized what was going on  younger son showed the dad craziest fucking night of my life ensued the dad trashed the house asked us what we knewbow long it was going onrealized we were hammered i hid under the bed i ve never been in such a fucked up situation yay booze.
i was 9  parents had friends over for new years and left their extra booze downstairs  next to the family room where me and my friends were delegated for the evening decided to go into fridge and try what our parents were drinking ended up being vodka  it was cold enough that it didnt bother us and we saw the adults doing it so we kept drinking it and pretending nothing happened ended up pooping in the waste basket in the basement and throwing beer bottles at cars.
got drunk in an alley with some friends from high school  forgot that some lady brought me out coal tablets cuz i was blacked out and i freaked out when i was throwing up black shit later thinking all my insides are coming out.
on my left one friend was passed out and on my right the other one was having sex i was 15 we drank way too many md 2020s once she started having sex i drank two to try to sleep and i got so drunk but was still awake   i was nt that drunk and so i woke my friend up to switch places w me.
well  i do nt remember the first time that i got  drunk   i know i was about 1415 though i remember my first drink  orange gatorade and captain morgan  do nt try it  i was 14 at my best friends house on a random weeknight in summer i hated it  i remember the first time that i was a shit show  i was 16 and we went to 4 different parties that night ended up at some apartment in a not fantastic part of town with a bunch of 20 something foreign guys i d never heard of before we had a handle of that uv lemonade premixed crap and the last thing i remember is someone asking if i wanted to mix it with moonshine  i said yes   then i recall being in my parents basement throwing up in the bathroom at 4am  highschool was so great  eyeroll   drinks franzia moscato out of mug.
home brew  spewed my guts up several times  my dad was there  he made sure i had plenty of water and made me eat some bread later in the night.
maybe i should share my first time  i was 17  and i was over at some dude s house that a bunch of my friends knew we went to his house and his parents were all cool with us being over and drinking we drank all sorts of stuff ranging from jack daniels to kirin ichiban beer  which tastes like ass do nt even bother drinking that horse piss   i was nt feeling anything until i decided that i needed to take a piss and suddenly the room span once i stood up i was groovin   feeling good  and just wanted to vibe with my friends i ll never forget washing my hands and seeing how fucked up i looked in that mirror before i walked out and kept drinking fast forward all these years later and here i am jamming out good times.
i was 16 years old  at a party  drank a bottle of wine  which is perfectly legal for a 16yr old in germany  and was pretty drunk since i do nt get hangovers it was a fantastic first time experience with alcohol but now that i m living alone it s a slight problem because i love wine waaaaay too much.
the first time i truly got drunk was visiting dartmouth i was on an official visit for football  was too scared to get drunk any of my previous times drinking  was visiting with one of my best friends  and just decided to go wild just broke up with my gf  frat parties  football parties and college girls as a senior in hs was heaven did nt puke  got some late night pizza  saw too many boobs to count that weekend was drunk for the plane ride him with my dad he was proud.
shit  i still remember i was 19 and i had just been dumped by my girlfriend at the time i loved her lamf and i had nt had a breakup that bad before i drank the vodka my family kept in the kitchen  for cooking  which i had never even been tempted by before i mixed it with cranberry juice and i remember watching mad men until i blacked out it felt so good and i did nt know that you actually could nt just keep going and going all of a sudden i was waking up in my bed with the door knob removed and the empty bottle there on the table my parents said they found me on the ground passed out and had no idea what was going on i felt really shitty about scaring them and even worse about the whole breakup despite the copious amounts of vodka i had zero hangover now that i miss.
i was 16 or 17 i asked my brother  he was 19  for a bottle of rum and he bought me spiced rum like a good bro i ended up downing the quart extra quick because it tasted like vanilla coke and i loved vanilla coke and the rest is history.
i only remember throwing up and saying i ll never drink again  but look at me now  ma  look at me noooow.
got out of school early drank vodka and tried to play halo with some friends wound up wandering to a park falling down the whole way and then getting arrested.
oh man  i remember this my best mate took me out for beers we drank a bunch of draft beers i had seven  ha  current me laughs   i threw up on myself on the train home i could nt drink that same beer for five years without feeling sick.
do nt remember  but my parents told me about it i was 25 years old  accidentally took a shot of whiskey at my dad s birthday party instadrunk  whiskey came out of my nose  staggered in the hallway and cried at the top of my lungs passed out later on and everything was fine  slept like a baby.
oh helli was probably 14 or so snuck my dad s crown royal in the back shed got hammered  decided to hang upsidedown off a tree limb  fell face first  broke my nose and spent most of the rest of the night bloody and puking good times were had.
fuck if i remember i think it was off of super cheap vodka when i was like14  ah  the good ole days.
i was 13 or 14  at a friend s confirmation party the restaurant we were at had no problems serving us wine  so i  naturally  got totally plastered spent most of the evening halfasleep.
was 14 and stole my mom s cranberry vodka i wasdizzy and fell down do nt remember that much  i did nt really start getting drunk again until the summer that i turned 18.
our town has a beer garden every summer i was age so i participated in the festivities i do nt remember much except it was awesome my girlfriend at the time picked me up and we went to mcdonalds then i fell asleep.
yesterday  21516   college dorm with svedka vodka am 19 and roommate and i decided to play shot pong at 5  00 pm sharp i m more of a toker so i had nt really gotten plastered before we played 4 rounds of pong with us taking one vodka shot per 3 pong cups and the last cup worth its own shot ended up taking 15 girlfriend tells me i was on the bathroom floor 50 minutes before i got up into bed  i remember having a blast  falling a lot  and feeling like everything was spinning took 8 videos that i had no recollection of what a day  edit  we found out i m the heavy weight of the group  must be genetics  but damn drinking is fun.

alright  i m quite abit hammered while writing this but still concious so thats something i guess do nt wan na get at how many times i had to correct  hoy  to  how  and  any  to  and  and concious to well you get it  the following steps are crutial  1 get a bottleabooze ready to drink  ready it  is important  2 inhale as much as you can  take a good healthy breathe in  3 exhale until you feel you have just a little bit    air left in you 4 take a good mouthful of booze  haha no pun intended   like make both cheeks like water balloons  i m serious i also just typed  seriums  once tbh wtf  the next step is important to be done quickly in succession  5 swallow 6 inhale thru your nose very quickly after swallowing  no long seconds delay  quickly  air thru the nose you get it   7    8 profit downed half a bottle of ugly tasting bourbon  hell i even spelled it bornben for one second how drunk i am  it could be a thing of practice  but it s rather easy just swallow and very shortly after inhale thru the nose  let that fresh air in  what it does is  most of the taste is actually  smell  passing thru the connectors that connect the nose with your mouthpartthingy  you know when your nose runs and it runs down your throat if its really bad  like very cold outside  thats those connections   them pipes theres an anotom anatomi i give up  theres a ana something correct way of naming it  when you think you taste  a wine  or whiskey  it is actually the vapors passing up back into your nose  which makes a burning feeling in your throat and nose as well  and makes you smell all the different flavours of the booze  wine  whatever alcohol you have  by inhaling  you push those flavours back  your tongue is actually only able to distinguish  sweet  sour  bitter thats it all the flavour is in your nose  practically that goes with all food or drink that  tastes  good  it is the little smell particels pushing pack into your nose parts and therefore creating a  smelltaste  sensation  this method of  pushing back  the flavours will also work on food  or anything that isnt entirely bitter  sweet or sour a lemmon will for example still mess you up  because the tongue mainly detects bitter and sour  so you may  soften  a bite on a lemmon a bit  but it wo nt be as effective  this method helped me win a couple bets and i as a drinking master  wanted to share this with you  enjoy  drink reasonable   safe  and dont drink and drive   forgot to add  you will ge t a little taste aka smell for about 5 secs after the chugg  because alcohol  sticks  to the slimy tissue in the throat mouth and tongue  but not as bad as just trying to sip from the bottle  the payload will go down like water  tasteless  like swallowing a huge clogged up pile of snot from a cold only will you shortly thereafter become an alcoholic like me and most importantly  drunk as a skunk high as a kite stiff as a board whatever you wan na name it.

inhale thru the nose  let that fresh air in  what it does is  most of the taste is actually  smell  passing thru the connectors that connect the nose with your mouthpartthingy  you know when your nose runs and it runs down your throat if its really bad  like very cold outside  thats those connections   them pipes theres an anotom anatomi i give up  theres a ana something correct way of naming it different flavours of the booze  wine  whatever alcohol you have  by inhaling  you push those flavours back  your tongue is actually only able to distinguish  sweet  sour  bitter thats it all the flavour is in your nose  practically that goes with all food or drink that  tastes  good  it is the little smell particels pushing pack into your nose parts and therefore creating a  smelltaste  sensation  this method of  pushing back  the flavours will also work on food  or anything that isnt entirely bitter  sweet or sour a lemmon will for example still mess you up  because the tongue mainly detects bitter and sour  so you may  soften  a bite on a lemmon a bit  but it wo nt be as effective  this method helped me win a couple bets and i as a drinking master  wanted to share this i was 15 at a friends house his dad was usually away on air force business his mom would let us have wine from time to time he had another friend that was 22 and was a regular presence there this night the dad was home for once but super sick with a kidney infection or some shit mom and 22 yr old get shit faced and let us drink vodka first time i ve had more than a single drink in a setting we decide in our drunkenness to go film people with our camera as was tradition long story short we found mom and 22 yr old fucking in the pool videoed it  nothing pervy we were yelling  what the fuck  as soon as we realized what was going on  younger son showed the dad craziest fucking night of my life ensued the dad trashed the house asked us what we knewbow long it was going onrealized we were hammered i hid under the bed i ve never been in such a fucked up situation yay booze.
i was 9  parents had friends over for new years and left their extra booze downstairs  next to the family room where me and my friends were delegated for the evening decided to go into fridge and try what our parents were drinking ended up being vodka  it was cold enough that it didnt bother us and we saw the adults doing it so we kept drinking it and pretending nothing happened ended up pooping in the waste basket in the basement and throwing beer bottles at cars.

what was it like getting drunk your first time  where  when  what was the occasion  have a drink and discuss it.
i was 15 me and two other girls broke into her uncle s house and stole a litre of this like  mexican illegal liquor between the three of us we drank it all i blacked out  i m 21 now  still blacking out  i may or may not be an alcoholic  but i love it so whatever lmao.
first few times were in high school and rather vaguestandard the real notable memory i have is the day of my 21st birthday i went to buy a bottle of vodka  took it home and got absolutely obliterated with my girlfriend in about 45 minutes threw up on my bed 1010 would do it again.
i was 15 at a friends house his dad was usually away on air force business his mom would let us have wine from time to time he had another friend that was 22 and was a regular presence there this night the dad was home for once but super sick with a kidney infection or some shit mom and 22 yr old get shit faced and let us drink vodka first time i ve had more than a single drink in a setting we decide in our drunkenness to go film people with our camera as was tradition long story short we found mom and 22 yr old fucking in the pool videoed it  nothing pervy we were yelling  what the fuck  as soon as we realized what was going on  younger son showed the dad craziest fucking night of my life ensued the dad trashed the house asked us what we knewbow long it was going onrealized we were hammered i hid under the bed i ve never been in such a fucked up situation yay booze.
i was 9  parents had friends over for new years and left their extra booze downstairs  next to the family room where me and my friends were delegated for the evening decided to go into fridge and try what our parents were drinking ended up being vodka  it was cold enough that it didnt bother us and we saw the adults doing it so we kept drinking it and pretending nothing happened ended up pooping in the waste basket in the basement and throwing beer bottles at cars.
got drunk in an alley with some friends from high school  forgot that some lady brought me out coal tablets cuz i was blacked out and i freaked out when i was throwing up black shit later thinking all my insides are coming out.
on my left one friend was passed out and on my right the other one was having sex i was 15 we drank way too many md 2020s once she started having sex i drank two to try to sleep and i got so drunk but was still awake   i was nt that drunk and so i woke my friend up to switch places w me.
well  i do nt remember the first time that i got  drunk   i know i was about 1415 though i remember my first drink  orange gatorade and captain morgan  do nt try it  i was 14 at my best friends house on a random weeknight in summer i hated it  i remember the first time that i was a shit show  i was 16 and we went to 4 different parties that night ended up at some apartment in a not fantastic part of town with a bunch of 20 something foreign guys i d never heard of before we had a handle of that uv lemonade premixed crap and the last thing i remember is someone asking if i wanted to mix it with moonshine  i said yes   then i recall being in my parents basement throwing up in the bathroom at 4am  highschool was so great  eyeroll   drinks franzia moscato out of mug.
home brew  spewed my guts up several times  my dad was there  he made sure i had plenty of water and made me eat some bread later in the night.
maybe i should share my first time  i was 17  and i was over at some dude s house that a bunch of my friends knew we went to his house and his parents were all cool with us being over and drinking we drank all sorts of stuff ranging from jack daniels to kirin ichiban beer  which tastes like ass do nt even bother drinking that horse piss   i was nt feeling anything until i decided that i needed to take a piss and suddenly the room span once i stood up i was groovin   feeling good  and just wanted to vibe with my friends i ll never forget washing my hands and seeing how fucked up i looked in that mirror before i walked out and kept drinking fast forward all these years later and here i am jamming out good times.
i was 16 years old  at a party  drank a bottle of wine  which is perfectly legal for a 16yr old in germany  and was pretty drunk since i do nt get hangovers it was a fantastic first time experience with alcohol but now that i m living alone it s a slight problem because i love wine waaaaay too much.
the first time i truly got drunk was visiting dartmouth i was on an official visit for football  was too scared to get drunk any of my previous times drinking  was visiting with one of my best friends  and just decided to go wild just broke up with my gf  frat parties  football parties and college girls as a senior in hs was heaven did nt puke  got some late night pizza  saw too many boobs to count that weekend was drunk for the plane ride him with my dad he was proud.
shit  i still remember i was 19 and i had just been dumped by my girlfriend at the time i loved her lamf and i had nt had a breakup that bad before i drank the vodka my family kept in the kitchen  for cooking  which i had never even been tempted by before i mixed it with cranberry juice and i remember watching mad men until i blacked out it felt so good and i did nt know that you actually could nt just keep going and going all of a sudden i was waking up in my bed with the door knob removed and the empty bottle there on the table my parents said they found me on the ground passed out and had no idea what was going on i felt really shitty about scaring them and even worse about the whole breakup despite the copious amounts of vodka i had zero hangover now that i miss.
i was 16 or 17 i asked my brother  he was 19  for a bottle of rum and he bought me spiced rum like a good bro i ended up downing the quart extra quick because it tasted like vanilla coke and i loved vanilla coke and the rest is history.
i only remember throwing up and saying i ll never drink again  but look at me now  ma  look at me noooow.

hey i ve been meaning to write a book i got some questions for you fellow author  first one is are you typing this on word.
what was it like getting drunk your first time  where  when  what was the occasion  have a drink and discuss it.
i was 15 me and two other girls broke into her uncle s house and stole a litre of this like  mexican illegal liquor between the three of us we drank it all i blacked out  i m 21 now  still blacking out  i may or may not be an alcoholic  but i love it so whatever lmao.
first few times were in high school and rather vaguestandard the real notable memory i have is the day of my 21st birthday i went to buy a bottle of vodka  took it home and got absolutely obliterated with my girlfriend in about 45 minutes threw up on my bed 1010 would do it again.
i was 15 at a friends house his dad was usually away on air force business his mom would let us have wine from time to time he had another friend that was 22 and was a regular presence there this night the dad was home for once but super sick with a kidney infection or some shit mom and 22 yr old get shit faced and let us drink vodka first time i ve had more than a single drink in a setting we decide in our drunkenness to go film people with our camera as was tradition long story short we found mom and 22 yr old fucking in the pool videoed it  nothing pervy we were yelling  what the fuck  as soon as we realized what was going on  younger son showed the dad craziest fucking night of my life ensued the dad trashed the house asked us what we knewbow long it was going onrealized we were hammered i hid under the bed i ve never been in such a fucked up situation yay booze.
i was 9  parents had friends over for new years and left their extra booze downstairs  next to the family room where me and my friends were delegated for the evening decided to go into fridge and try what our parents were drinking ended up being vodka  it was cold enough that it didnt bother us and we saw the adults doing it so we kept drinking it and pretending nothing happened ended up pooping in the waste basket in the basement and throwing beer bottles at cars.
got drunk in an alley with some friends from high school  forgot that some lady brought me out coal tablets cuz i was blacked out and i freaked out when i was throwing up black shit later thinking all my insides are coming out.
on my left one friend was passed out and on my right the other one was having sex i was 15 we drank way too many md 2020s once she started having sex i drank two to try to sleep and i got so drunk but was still awake   i was nt that drunk and so i woke my friend up to switch places w me.
well  i do nt remember the first time that i got  drunk   i know i was about 1415 though i remember my first drink  orange gatorade and captain morgan  do nt try it  i was 14 at my best friends house on a random weeknight in summer i hated it  i remember the first time that i was a shit show  i was 16 and we went to 4 different parties that night ended up at some apartment in a not fantastic part of town with a bunch of 20 something foreign guys i d never heard of before we had a handle of that uv lemonade premixed crap and the last thing i remember is someone asking if i wanted to mix it with moonshine  i said yes   then i recall being in my parents basement throwing up in the bathroom at 4am  highschool was so great  eyeroll   drinks franzia moscato out of mug.
home brew  spewed my guts up several times  my dad was there  he made sure i had plenty of water and made me eat some bread later in the night.
maybe i should share my first time  i was 17  and i was over at some dude s house that a bunch of my friends knew we went to his house and his parents were all cool with us being over and drinking we drank all sorts of stuff ranging from jack daniels to kirin ichiban beer  which tastes like ass do nt even bother drinking that horse piss   i was nt feeling anything until i decided that i needed to take a piss and suddenly the room span once i stood up i was groovin   feeling good  and just wanted to vibe with my friends i ll never forget washing my hands and seeing how fucked up i looked in that mirror before i walked out and kept drinking fast forward all these years later and here i am jamming out good times.
i was 16 years old  at a party  drank a bottle of wine  which is perfectly legal for a 16yr old in germany  and was pretty drunk since i do nt get hangovers it was a fantastic first time experience with alcohol but now that i m living alone it s a slight problem because i love wine waaaaay too much.
the first time i truly got drunk was visiting dartmouth i was on an official visit for football  was too scared to get drunk any of my previous times drinking  was visiting with one of my best friends  and just decided to go wild just broke up with my gf  frat parties  football parties and college girls as a senior in hs was heaven did nt puke  got some late night pizza  saw too many boobs to count that weekend was drunk for the plane ride him with my dad he was proud.
shit  i still remember i was 19 and i had just been dumped by my girlfriend at the time i loved her lamf and i had nt had a breakup that bad before i drank the vodka my family kept in the kitchen  for cooking  which i had never even been tempted by before i mixed it with cranberry juice and i remember watching mad men until i blacked out it felt so good and i did nt know that you actually could nt just keep going and going all of a sudden i was waking up in my bed with the door knob removed and the empty bottle there on the table my parents said they found me on the ground passed out and had no idea what was going on i felt really shitty about scaring them and even worse about the whole breakup despite the copious amounts of vodka i had zero hangover now that i miss.
i was 16 or 17 i asked my brother  he was 19  for a bottle of rum and he bought me spiced rum like a good bro i ended up downing the quart extra quick because it tasted like vanilla coke and i loved vanilla coke and the rest is history.

well you get it  the following steps are crutial  1 get a bottleabooze ready to drink  ready it  is important  2 inhale as much as you can  take a good healthy breathe in  3 exhale until you feel you have just a little bit    air left in you 4 take a good mouthful of booze  haha no pun intended   like make both cheeks like water balloons  i m serious i also just typed  seriums  once tbh wtf  the next step is important to be done quickly in succession  5 swallow 6 inhale thru your nose very quickly after swallowing  no long seconds delay  quickly  air thru the nose you get it   7    8 profit downed half a bottle of ugly tasting bourbon  hell i even spelled it bornben for one second how drunk i am  it could be a thing of practice  but it s rather easy just swallow and very shortly after inhale thru the nose  let that fresh air in  what it does is  most of the taste is actually  smell  passing thru the connectors that connect the nose with your mouthpartthingy  you know when your nose runs and it runs down your throat if its really bad  like very cold outside  thats those connections   them pipes theres an anotom anatomi i give up  theres a ana something correct way of naming it  when you think you taste  a wine  or whiskey  it is actually the vapors passing up back into your nose  which makes a burning feeling in your throat and nose as well  and makes you smell all the different flavours of the booze  wine  whatever alcohol you have  by inhaling  you push those flavours back  your tongue is actually only able to distinguish  sweet  sour  bitter thats it all the flavour is in your nose  practically that goes with all food or drink that  tastes  good  it is the little smell particels pushing pack into your nose parts and therefore creating a  smelltaste  sensation  this method of  pushing back  the flavours will also work on food  or anything that isnt entirely bitter  sweet or sour a lemmon will for example still mess you up  because the tongue mainly detects bitter and sour  so you may  soften  a bite on a lemmon a bit  but it wo nt be as effective  this method helped me win a couple bets and i as a drinking master  wanted to share this with you  enjoy  drink reasonable   safe  and dont drink and drive   forgot to add  you will ge t a little taste aka smell for about 5 secs after the chugg  because alcohol  sticks  to the slimy tissue in the throat mouth and tongue  but not as bad as just trying to sip from the bottle  the payload will go down like water  tasteless  like swallowing a huge clogged up pile of snot from a cold only will you shortly thereafter become an alcoholic like me and most importantly  drunk as a skunk high as a kite stiff as a board whatever you wan na name it.

i was 15 me and two other girls broke into her uncle s house and stole a litre of this like  mexican illegal liquor between the three of us we drank it all i blacked out  i m 21 now  still blacking out  i may or may not be an alcoholic  but i love it so whatever lmao.
first few times were in high school and rather vaguestandard the real notable memory i have is the day of my 21st birthday i went to buy a bottle of vodka  took it home and got absolutely obliterated with my girlfriend in about 45 minutes threw up on my bed 1010 would do it again.
i was 15 at a friends house his dad was usually away on air force business his mom would let us have wine from time to time he had another friend that was 22 and was a regular presence there this night the dad was home for once but super sick with a kidney infection or some shit mom and 22 yr old get shit faced and let us drink vodka first time i ve had more than a single drink in a setting we decide in our drunkenness to go film people with our camera as was tradition long story short we found mom and 22 yr old fucking in the pool videoed it  nothing pervy we were yelling  what the fuck  as soon as we realized what was going on  younger son showed the dad craziest fucking night of my life ensued the dad trashed the house asked us what we knewbow long it was going onrealized we were hammered i hid under the bed i ve never been in such a fucked up situation yay booze.
i was 9  parents had friends over for new years and left their extra booze downstairs  next to the family room where me and my friends were delegated for the evening decided to go into fridge and try what our parents were drinking ended up being vodka  it was cold enough that it didnt bother us and we saw the adults doing it so we kept drinking it and pretending nothing happened ended up pooping in the waste basket in the basement and throwing beer bottles at cars.
got drunk in an alley with some friends from high school  forgot that some lady brought me out coal tablets cuz i was blacked out and i freaked out when i was throwing up black shit later thinking all my insides are coming out.
on my left one friend was passed out and on my right the other one was having sex i was 15 we drank way too many md 2020s once she started having sex i drank two to try to sleep and i got so drunk but was still awake   i was nt that drunk and so i woke my friend up to switch places w me.
well  i do nt remember the first time that i got  drunk   i know i was about 1415 though i remember my first drink  orange gatorade and captain morgan  do nt try it  i was 14 at my best friends house on a random weeknight in summer i hated it  i remember the first time that i was a shit show  i was 16 and we went to 4 different parties that night ended up at some apartment in a not fantastic part of town with a bunch of 20 something foreign guys i d never heard of before we had a handle of that uv lemonade premixed crap and the last thing i remember is someone asking if i wanted to mix it with moonshine  i said yes   then i recall being in my parents basement throwing up in the bathroom at 4am  highschool was so great  eyeroll   drinks franzia moscato out of mug.

next step is important to be done quickly in succession  5 swallow 6 inhale thru your nose very quickly after swallowing  no long seconds delay  quickly  air thru the nose you get it   7    8 profit downed half a bottle of ugly tasting bourbon  hell i even spelled it bornben for one second how drunk i am  it could be a thing of practice  but it s rather easy just swallow and very shortly after inhale thru the nose  let that fresh air in  what it does is  most of the taste is actually  smell  passing thru the connectors that connect the nose with your mouthpartthingy  you know when your nose runs and it runs down your throat if its really bad  like very cold outside  thats those connections   them pipes theres an anotom anatomi i give up  theres a ana something correct way of naming it  when you think you taste  a wine  or whiskey  it is actually the vapors passing up back into your nose  which makes a burning feeling in your throat and nose as well  and makes you smell all the different flavours of the booze  wine  whatever alcohol you have  by inhaling  you push those flavours back  your tongue is actually only able to distinguish  sweet  sour  bitter thats it all the flavour is in your nose  practically that goes with all food or drink that  tastes  good  it is the little smell particels pushing pack into your nose parts and therefore creating a  smelltaste  sensation  this method of  pushing back  the flavours will also work on food  or anything that isnt entirely bitter  sweet or sour a lemmon will for example still mess you up  because the tongue mainly detects bitter and sour  so you may  soften  a bite on a lemmon a bit  but it wo nt be as effective  this method helped me win a couple bets and i as a drinking master  wanted to share this with you  enjoy  drink reasonable   safe  and dont drink and drive   forgot to add  you will ge t a little taste aka smell for about 5 secs after the chugg  because alcohol  sticks  to the slimy tissue in the throat mouth and tongue  but not as bad as just trying to sip from the bottle  the payload will go down like water  tasteless  like swallowing a huge clogged up pile of snot from a cold
